page.title: 10LAW/ORDER.POLITICS.GOVRNMENT
page.content: Policed by Devon and Cornwall Consta- bulary with nearest police station at Tavistock.Community policemen are all- ocated different areas.Nearest Magistrate Court - Tavistock,otherwise Plymouth.Low crime rate - usually burglary of theft from slightly isolated houses or farm buildings, plus usual crop of motoring offences. Politically mainly Conservative or Liberal. Low turnout fo local elections, but more effort made for General Elections. Government administration by Parish Councils (Lamerton, Sydenham Damerel, Milton Abbot), West Devon Borough Council and Devon County Council.
